page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: On Sunday 7th July 1985 I got up at 08:45.We were going for a picnic.I had my breakfast and we were ready to go at 10:30.We arrived near Burwardsley, where we were to have our picnic, at 11:45.After we had finished we drove a short distance to a farm where we picked some strawberries.We picked two baskets full which cost Â£2.36.When we got back to the car we sunbathed for about two hours.We packed away and started for home via Crewe.Here we stopped for our tea at Macdonalds Hamburger Restaurant.Then we returned home and on arrival I played tennis with my brother in the back garden.At about 7:30 I went inside and watched TV until 9:30.Then I played on the computer until 10:00.Being tired out I then had a wash and went to bed. {By Melanie Johnson.
